int.name: lost_co
int.description: Trajectories leave confined region moving co-current

int.name: lost_counter
int.description: Trajectories leave confined region moving counter-current

int.name: co_counter
int.description: Trajectories in co- and counter-current directions

int.name: banana
int.description: Non-axis encircling trajectories that reverse parallel motion (are trapped)

int.name: potato
int.description: Axis encircling trajectories that reverse parallel motion (are trapped)
